title: Taishou Yakyuu Musume. Specials
original_name: 大正野球娘。今夜の私は浪漫ちっくストライク
ending_song: "Yume Miru Kokoro (ユメ・ミル・ココロ)" by Kanae Itou
sinopse: The members of Ohka-kai heard of a rumor of an equipment called "kondara" (Japanese slang of a roller used to level the ground), which is essential to baseball. As they discuss what a Kondara is, the hot debate goes causes the excited members to get confused. Finally, Koume decides to look for a kondara, but Anna is also excited and cannot be counted on.
